attributes.action: Stop us tax payers paying out for benefits for people with more than two welfare funded children
attributes.additional_details:
How about we actually try to reduce the tax payer’s burden and stop people leaching off everyone else by having more children to get more benefits.

Some people have to work hard for a comfy lifestyle which is getting harder and harder.

I propose this country should put a limit on only paying for two children where parents are not working - sitting on their bottoms doing nothing or should I say backs producing more money spinning children.
